title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, June 25, 2020
description: 70 years ago today, North Korea invaded South Korea. The Korean War became the first war that the United States concluded without success.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: 70 years ago today, North Korea invaded South Korea. The Korean War became the first war that the United States concluded without success.
